title: WeWork Needs Cash. Here’s Why SoftBank May Ante Up.
text:
After reading this week’s Wall Street Journal story asserting that SoftBank Group might sink billions more into WeWork to help shore up the struggling real-estate unicorn, a reasonable person might ask the question: Why would SoftBank want to double down on WeWork?

After all, where once stood an innovative real-estate firm with a $47 billion private-market valuation, there now sits a struggling, debt-bloated business with a disgraced founder who was forced out as CEO due to his abhorrent corporate governance practices. It’s...
description: SoftBank may sink billions more into WeWork to help shore up the struggling real-estate unicorn. A reasonable person might ask the question: Why would SoftBank want to double down on WeWork?
